description: This cluster is for assigning artifacts tags that are just below the level of strategic language, but above the terminology used at the tactical level of cybersecurity.  This cluster in particular aligns to terminology used to describe existential threats to cybersecurity.
name: EXISTENTIAL-THREAT

values.description: Deliberate actions aimed to cause disruption or damage to information and or IT assets for financial or personal gain.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Operational Framework: HITRUST TC LIC1 Sabotage
